short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick searchbar, can search websites in tabs, bookmarks, histories, Raindrop and EasyNav, also can search TOC in web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
❖ Features
1. Search websites in tabs/bookmarks/histories/Raindrop/EasyNav in one place, in the same way.
2. Search TOC(table of contents) in any page.

❖ Usage
1. Install the extension.
2. Click the extension icon to open search bar(It's recommended to right click the extension icon and pin it if you use it in this way).
3. Search and Navigate, it's recommended to use keyboard to select and enter.

❖ Shortcuts
It's highly recommended to set shortcut for quick open search bar in the browser.
To set shortcut, go to: chrome://extensions/shortcuts

❖ Integrations
For now, it integrates Raindrop(raindrop.io) and EasyNav(easy-nav.cc).
